featured.text: With the worsening of global economic conditions, it seems wiser and more _____ to keep cash in the bank rather than to invest in the stock market.
But its special multi-functional design later launched the knife as a global brand.
Rap's rise and sustained global popularity is a good illustration of how influential youth culture is on youth attitudes and behavior.
Global sales of hard hats totaled USD 2.1 billion in 2016, and are expected to reach USD 3.19 billion in 2025. 39.

other.text: Due to the global financial crisis, the country’s exports _____ by 40 percent last month, the largest drop since 2000.

According to the Climate Change Group, formed by environmentalists worldwide to document the effects of global warming, Mount Kilimanjaro’s snows and glaciers are melting and are 23 to disappear by 2020.
Rising temperatures, an effect of global warming, 25 threaten the ecosystem of this mountain area.

definition.en_def: Relating to the whole world; worldwide.
definition.example: The internet has created a global community.
